meanings.sent1: The creosoted fence posts stood strong against the weather.
meanings.sent2: The creosoted wood had a distinct smell in the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The creosoted playground equipment seemed to repel even the most determined graffiti artists.
meanings.sent4: Her creosoted boots left a trail of protection wherever she walked.
meanings.sent5: The creosoted surface gleamed with a dark, oily sheen.

meanings.sent1: The creosoted railway ties were resistant to decay.
meanings.sent2: The creosoted timber beams retained their strength over time.
meanings.sent3: The creosoted picnic tables seemed to deter even the hungriest of ants.
meanings.sent4: His creosoted jacket shielded him from the biting wind.
meanings.sent5: The creosoted fence posts stood as guardians of the property.
